ygData.subject: Re: Resistance and Rhythym songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Is it possible that certain spells are double checked against your resistances?  I am doin a bit speculating and was wondering if a sock of frost for
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 30 Jul 1999, John Kim wrote:
> I'm pretty sure I'm right and most DD spells check your fire
> or cold resist. You can't raise those as high since the Psalm
> series does not stack with Elemental or Purifying Rhythms.
> Everything seems to stack with Guardian Rhythms.

Is it possible that certain spells are double checked against your
resistances? I am doin a bit speculating and was wondering if a sock of
frost for instance would be checked against cold resistance and magic
resistance since most players have relatively low cold resistance. I
think I will have to check this out somehow.

Treilanin Loreweaver
